Posts.Content: Thanks for everyone's input. I would have paid for the PSA test myself but was just curious to know if what the radiologist said was correct about Medicare.
Posts.Title: PSA test frequency covered under Medicare

Posts.Content: I have completed my radiation treatment for prostate cancer and have received PSA results of 1.6 & 1.8 for last two tests after treatment. My radiologist said that Medicare will cover PSA tests every 6 months for 5 years after having had prostate cancer treatment. Is this true?
Posts.Title: PSA test frequency covered under Medicare
